title: Spring Blossom Sona

replies.body: I've got to say, that Sona artwork looks f*cking fabulous.
yes yes yes yes yes yes I love everything about this. {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
I initially thought this was fanart of her existing Sweetheart skin. Maybe it'll be produced as a "Variant" of that.
Absolutely beautiful. A million times better than Odyssey.
